Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: My reputation as a trustee has further deteriorated due to the rejection of my allocation plan by investor Hannah Muller. This incident underlines persistent concerns regarding my trustworthiness and fairness in profit-sharing proposals. Immediate attention to improve my proposal strategies and partnership dynamics is essential to restore credibility in the investment community.
